description:
With Daigo`s epic game ending hit, Fuurin Middle defeats the formidable opponent Seiwa Middle, where Daigo`s old friends Urabe and Andy play.
They are now moving on to the semi-finals of the district tournament.
Despite being tired from the intense game, the Fuurin players watch another school`s game, however Tao and Yayoi sneak away after the game.
Anita had looked up to Tao and Yayoi as her senpais since their time at Yokohama Littles, so their behavior deeply concerns her while she goes to have her injury checked out.
Source: crunchyroll
